title: What If the British Won the Revolutionary War? - A Conversation With Colin
description:
Remember when America won its independence? What if that never happened?

Today's topic was submitted by FPSShark. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.
